properties.name: app.email.from
properties.description: The email address used as the sender in outgoing emails.

properties.name: app.security.admin.username
properties.description: The username for the admin user.

properties.name: app.security.admin.password
properties.description: The password for the admin user.

properties.name: app.security.admin.token-secret
properties.description: The secret key used to sign admin authentication tokens.

properties.name: app.security.admin.token-expiration-seconds
properties.description: The expiration time in seconds for admin authentication tokens.
